text: we're here today at Dreer Farms announcing open access to our blueberries right into China this is going to be a great benefit to Farmers right here in British Columbia opening more and more markets for us is obviously help helping us to Market our product to uh keep the prices up as the blueberries are coming on more and more we need more places to ship them it's a great thing for blueberry producers because it allows us to diversify our markets it's allows us to employ more labor keep labor force more active at allows a whole host of things uh opportunity for higher revenues on some some products and hopefully over the next few years as we wrap up we'll get about $65 million more in export value out of our blueberries into the Chinese [Music] market
